properties.name: morn.exception.enabled
properties.description: Enable exception features for the application.

properties.description: The default prefix for Exception Message.

properties.name: morn.exception.default-code
properties.description: The default code for Exception Message.

properties.name: morn.exception.solution-suffix
properties.description: The default solution suffix for Exception Message.

properties.name: morn.exception.message-suffix
properties.description: The default message suffix for Exception Message.

properties.description: Enable exception global aspect features for the application.

properties.description: Enable exception interpreter features for the application.

properties.name: morn.exception-interpreter.validate.enabled
properties.description: Enable validate exception interpreter features for the application.

properties.name: morn.exception-interpreter.shiro.enabled
properties.description: Enable Shiro exception interpreter features for the application.

properties.name: morn.operate.enabled
properties.description: Enable operation log features for the application.

properties.name: morn.operate.default-converter.enabled
properties.description: Enable default operation converter features for the application.

properties.description: The default prefix for REST Message.

properties.description: The default success code for REST Message.

properties.name: morn.rest.message-suffix
properties.description: The default message suffix for REST Message.

properties.name: morn.translator.enabled
properties.description: Enable translator features for the application.

properties.name: morn.validator.enabled
properties.description: Enable validator features for the application.
